subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which well-known palace in Rajasthan was built during the Mughal era?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कई मुगल समय के समय में बनाया गया एक जानकारी के लिए इसे पूछें।
explanation_en: Amer Fort, also known as Amer Fort, is a historic palace located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It was built during the Mughal era and is a popular tourist attraction.
explanation_hi: आमेर कंधन, Jaipur, Rajasthan में प्रवक्षति करों के लिए बने हैं।

Explanation_en: The famous Rajput king who established Jaipur, also known as Amer, built the Amer Fort. The fort was named after his mother Queen Jodhan, who was a princess from the Guhil Rathore clan. His father was Maharaja Man Singh, a member of the Kachwara Rathore clan.
